scripts.lint: pnpm run prettier && pnpm run tslint
scripts.lint:check: pnpm run prettier:check && pnpm run tslint:check
scripts.package: rm -rf build/package && mkdir -p build/package && cp -r build/tsc/* package.json README.md build/package
scripts.deploy: pnpm run clean && pnpm run tsc && pnpm run package && npm publish ./build/package --access public
